title: (x) Ghost Whisperer logo - Requiem {Franz Heidl}
content:
Hi!  
Could U help me again?! This time I need to id font from “Ghost Whisperer”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022041im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hdr_636_1_5572.jpg)

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Wide serif body type - Bookman {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022041/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36000 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Sorenson Group logo - ITC Fenice {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022041/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35999 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Caise

comments.content:
I’d say that’s Requiem by Hoefler & Frere-Jones.  
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917022041/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/ "http://www.typography.com/catalog/requiem/")
I was going to say Garamond Classico, but the ’E’ is throwing me off...
